entry.title: Sunday: A few flurries. High minus 14.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending early this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this afternoon. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 30 this morning and minus 20 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 31.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 31. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of light snow. High minus 12. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow in the afternoon. Wind becoming north 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 40 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Sunday 19 February 2023
